content: repeat from * around 6 fasten_off weave through the last stitches pull tight to close and weave in the ends thread the yarn tail from the first top onto a tapestry needle and sew the hole between the two tops of the heart closed weave in the end inside the heart i d love to see your finished projects if you enjoyed making this warm hug heart be sure to share it on instagram and tag me @hill_yarns this pattern and pictures are property of olena kostrytsia its use is only permitted for personal purpose and not for commercial one you can neither sell nor distribute this pattern or any pattern created after this one questions hill yarns@gmail com photographs hillyarns by olena happy crocheting web https //hillyarns in this pattern and pictures are property of olena kostrytsia its use is only permitted for personal purpose and not for commercial one you can neither sell nor distribute this pattern or any pattern created after this one questions hill yarns@gmail com photographs hillyarns by olena
